semantic_title: Coding Guidelines for Toxic Effects from Harmful Substances
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 19. Chapter 19: Injury, poisoning, and certain other consequences of external causes > e. Adverse Effects, Poisoning, Underdosing and Toxic Effects > (d) Toxic Effects

content.full_text: When a harmful substance is ingested or comes in contact with a person, this is classified as a toxic effect. The toxic effect codes are in categories T51-T65. When coding a toxic effect, assign the toxic effect code first, followed by codes for all associated manifestations of the toxic effect. Toxic effect codes have an associated intent: accidental, intentional self-harm, assault and undetermined. For Sequela (Late Effects) see Section I.B.10. Sequela (Evidence: pg no: 84-85, L18-L26)
content.summary: Toxic effects from harmful substances are coded with T51-T65, sequenced first with manifestations following, and include intent indicators (Evidence: pg no: 84-85, L18-L26)

detailed_rules.rule_text: When a harmful substance is ingested or comes in contact with a person, this is classified as a toxic effect (Evidence: pg no: 84, L19-L20)
detailed_rules.explanation: Toxic effects occur when harmful substances enter the body through ingestion or contact, distinct from drug poisoning (Evidence: pg no: 84, L19-L20)

detailed_rules.rule_text: When coding a toxic effect, assign the toxic effect code first, followed by codes for all associated manifestations of the toxic effect (Evidence: pg no: 84, L20-L21)
detailed_rules.explanation: Toxic effect codes from T51-T65 are sequenced as primary codes, with all resulting symptoms and conditions coded as secondary (Evidence: pg no: 84, L20-L21)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Toxic effect codes have an associated intent: accidental, intentional self-harm, assault and undetermined (Evidence: pg no: 85, L24-L25)
detailed_rules.explanation: All toxic effect codes must include intent specification using appropriate character indicators (Evidence: pg no: 85, L24-L25)
